security: The document is released with deletions, indicating that some information is considered sensitive and has been withheld. Releasing the full document could potentially reveal sources, methods, or information that could harm individuals or compromise intelligence operations.
summary: This document is an identification form and cover sheet for a report from the 108th Military Intelligence Group, dated November 22, 1968, concerning Manuel Marti and a characterization of Horizons for Youth.
summary_one_paragraph: Released under the JFK Assassination Records Collection Act, this document comprises an identification form and cover sheet related to a report from the 108th Military Intelligence Group (I-NYFO). Dated November 22, 1968, the report, filed under number 8240-6019 and agent report date of 22 November 1968 concerns Manuel Marti and includes a characterization of HORIZONS for YOUTH.
title: [ RESTRICTED ]
